text: "Gun" is a 2013 song by the Scottish synth-pop band Chvrches. It is the third single from their first studio album The Bones of What You Believe which was released in 2013. ==Music video== A music video for the song was released on 14 June 2013. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ;Chvrches * Lauren Mayberry – lead vocals, additional synthesizers, production * Iain Cook – synthesizers, guitar, bass, vocals, production * Martin Doherty – synthesizers, samplers, vocals, production ;Other personnel *Rich Costey – mixing *Jonny Scott – drums ==Chart positions== Chart (2013) Peak Position Japan Hot 100Billboard Japan Hot 100 (retrieved 19 September 2013) 82 UK singles chart 55 ==References== Category:2013 songs Category:Chvrches songs
title: Gun (song)
